name: Random Pokémon Name Generator
description: Gotta name 'em all! Stuck naming your new Pokémon OC? Or maybe you need a killer team name for your next tournament? This generator conjures up awesome, original Pokémon names faster than a Pikachu can say 'Pika!'
introduction: Ever feel like all the cool Pokémon names are already taken? Fear not, trainer! Our Random Pokémon Name Generator is here to spark your creativity. Whether you're writing fanfiction, designing your own Pokémon game, or just looking for a laugh, we've got you covered with names that are electrifying, mysterious, and everything in between. Get ready to catch 'em all... the *names*, that is!
howToUse: Prepare to be amazed by the sheer awesomeness of the Pokémon name that appears.
If you're not feeling it, smash that 'Generate' button again! We've got more names than a Snorlax has naps.
Copy and paste your favorite name into your project, or just admire it for its sheer brilliance.
Share your awesome new Pokémon name with the world and bask in the glory.

faqs.question: Are these names *real* Pokémon names?
faqs.answer: Nope! These are original names generated by our super-secret (not really) algorithm. They're designed to sound like they *could* be real, though!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my fanfiction/game/other creative project?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Go wild! We encourage creativity and sharing. Just maybe give us a little shout-out if you're feeling generous.

faqs.question: How does the generator actually work?
faqs.answer: Magic! Just kidding (sort of). It combines prefixes and suffixes inspired by real Pokémon names, types, and characteristics to create something new and exciting.

faqs.question: I don't like the names that are being generated. What can I do?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button! With enough tries, you're bound to find a name that resonates with your inner Pokémon trainer. You can also try again later – inspiration strikes at different times!

faqs.question: Is this generator free to use?
faqs.answer: You betcha! Use it as much as you like. We're here to help you unleash your inner Pokémon master, one awesome name at a time.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We're always open to suggestions! Send them our way and we might just add them to the generator. Who knows, your idea could be the next big thing in Pokémon naming!
